Help:Node.title: Command Usage: assist
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: @assist "[help text]"
EXAMPLE: @assist "I'm stuck in my room!"
Sends a request for assistance. After you have sent an assist, a StoryHost or StoryGuide will page you.
{? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach | Note that Customer Experience is only available during certain hours, as noted on the Marrach portal page. Also note that while there may not be StoryHosts or StoryGuides listed on the who, it does not always mean we are not available.
Please also keep in mind that assists should be used for Out Of Character assistance.
| {? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | GES | Note that Customer Experience is only available during limited hours. Also note that while there may not be StoryHosts or StoryGuides listed on the who, it does not always mean we are not available.
Please also keep in mind that assists should be used for Out Of Character assistance.
| Assistance in this Chat Theatre is primarily provided by volunteers. If you do not receive rapid assistance, and other players are unable to help you, please send email to ce@skotos.net with your query.
}} SEE ALSO: @help, @page
